2577B2B4.Mod1_Description: {c_important}Fireball's{/c} radius is increased based on distance traveled, up to {c_number}[{SF_5} * 100|%|]{/c}.

74D6BC35.Mod2_Description: {c_important}Fireball's{/c} explosion's Critical Strike Damage is increased by {c_number}[{SF_19} * 100|%+|]{/c}. Each enemy it hits increases this bonus by {c_number}[{SF_20} * 100|%+|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_21} * 100|%+|]{/c} total.

B252E239.Mod6_Description: {c_important}Fireball{/c} deals {c_number}[{SF_23} * 100|%|]{/c} of the Burning damage you've applied to enemies as additional direct damage.
